link.title: Update: Distance Learning for the Remainder of School Year

article.class: post-1946 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-news

header.h2: Weekly Covid-19 Family Update for the Week of 4/7/20

span.span: Help Us Help You: Please take 5 minutes to complete a 3 question survey about Distance Learning at DPBR! Our goal is to get 100 families to reply, so please help us out by responding TODAY with your open and honest feedback.

“Live with Livingston”: Mark your calendars for a live chat with Principal Livinsgton on Tuesday, April 21st at 5:30p. More information about signing in will be available on our website and social media platforms the day-of! We are excited to see you and hear from you!

p.span: Spring Break, Monday, April 13th through Friday, April 17th: Over Spring Break, we encourage scholars to complete any assignments that have been posted for their grade level and subject area since Monday, March 23rd. During this window, no new assignments will be posted online and there will be no office hours.
During this window, we WILL CONTINUE meal distribution.
K-2 Scholars will begin using SEESAW on MONDAY, APRIL 20th. Scholars in K-2nd will be expected to log into Seesaw every day beginning Monday, 4/20 instead of Google Classroom.
Seesaw is a more kid-friendly site that will allow our youngest scholars to be more independent as they work on their distance learning assignments.
Scholars will be able to access Seesaw from their Clever dashboards.
Teachers will post new activities and lessons to Seesaw every weekday.
Scholars will be able to hear and read feedback from their teachers on the completed lessons within their Seesaw accounts.
We will post Seesaw introduction and overview videos to the K-2 Info & Resources page on the Distance Learning website and our school social media accounts this Friday.

div.span: Spirit Week: Our school will have our annual Spirit Week the week of April 20th! Themes and challenges will be posted on Friday, April 10th. Check back here to be sure that you’re ready to show your DP PRIDE!

REMINDER–Meal Distribution Update: Meals will be available on Mondays and Wednesdays. We are shifting to two days of distribution in an effort to limit the number of times families and staff could potentially come into contact with each other and to observe social distancing as much as possible.

li.span: Monday meal packages will be for Monday and Tuesday.
Wednesday meal packages will be for Wednesday, Thursday, and Friday.

div.span: If you have any questions about this, please call the Front Office of the school at 225-372-2037.

REMINDER–Ongoing Communication: Keep in touch with us by asking ANY questions you have here. And you can always visit our Distance Learning Website here for anything (and everything you need). Our next family update will come out on Tuesday, April 21st!
